parameters.name: gatewayId
parameters.description: The instance ID. If you specify an ID, an exact search is performed.

parameters.name: keyword
parameters.description: The search keyword. A full match is performed. The search is case-insensitive.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The instance name. If you specify a name, an exact search is performed.

parameters.name: pageNumber
parameters.description: The number of the page to return.

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries per page.

parameters.name: tag
parameters.description: The tags that you want to use for the search.
